exec: // 設置 access token 和 refresh token

request.description:
Generated from cURL:   curl -X POST
  http://localhost:8000/account/auth/logout/ \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer 
  your_access_token_here" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json"

Generated from cURL:  curl -X POST
  http://localhost:8000/account/members/ \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d '{
      "username": "testuser",
      "email": "testuser@example.com",
      "password": "password123",
      "full_name": "Test User",
      "phone": "0912345678",
      "type": "tourist"
    }'

  http://localhost:8000/account/members/ \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \

      "username": "testuser",
      "email": "testuser@example.com",
      "password": "password123",
      "full_name": "Test User",
      "phone": "0912345678",
      "type": "tourist"
    }'

    -H "Content-Type: application/json"

    -H "Content-Type: application/json"

item.name: get range hour across day and hour

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --location
  'http://localhost:8000/api/statistic/hourly-overview/?collected_time__gte=2025-09-03T09:00:00&collected_time__lte=2025-09-03T17:00:00' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer your_token' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json'

Generated from cURL:   curl -X GET "http://localhost:8000/api/bike/realtime-status/" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_STAFF_TOKEN" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json"

    -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"

item.name: rental a bike to member via email

request.description:
Generated from cURL:   curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/rental/staff/rentals/" \

    -d '{
      "bike_id": "BIKE001",
      "member_email": "user@example.com",
      "memo": "員工協助租借"
    }'

item.name: create bike info with telemetry device

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/bike/bikes/" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d '{
      "bike_id": "BIKE002",
      "bike_name": "City Bike Beta",
      "bike_model": "CB-2024-002",
      "series": 1,
      "telemetry_device_imei": "867295075673999"
    }'

Generated from cURL: curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:8000/api/bike/bikes/BIKE001/" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE"

Generated from cURL: curl -X GET "http://localhost:8000/api/bike/error-log-status/?is_read=false" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN"

Generated from cURL: curl -X GET \
    'http://localhost:8000/api/bike/error-log-status/?level=critical' \
    -H 'Authorization: Token YOUR_TOKEN_HERE' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json'

Generated from cURL: curl -X GET \
    'http://localhost:8000/api/bike/error-log-status/?is_read=false' \
    -H 'Authorization: Token YOUR_TOKEN_HERE' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json'

Generated from cURL:   curl -X PATCH \
    'http://localhost:8000/api/bike/error-log-status/{error_log_status_id}/' \
    -H 'Authorization: Token YOUR_TOKEN_HERE' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{
      "is_read": true
    }'
